name: SAHUAGIN PRIEST

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: The sahuagin has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.text: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.text: The sahuagin can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The sahuagin makes two Spectral Jaws attacks.

actions.name: Spectral Jaws
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The sahuagin casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12): At Will: Thaumaturgy 2/Day Each: Hold Person, Tongues

bonus_actions.name: Fiendish Aid (2/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The sahuagin casts Bless or Healing Word, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
